name: Mediapark
tagline: We design and build web based software and mobile
description:
Mediapark provides design and development service. Company works as a one-stop-shop for project planning, requirement analysis, UI / UX, development, testing, implementation and support. Founded in 2010 in Lithuania, the partnership-based company has grown to 100+ employees working in Vilnius, Kaunas, Riga and Kaliningrad.
 
Mediapark has served more than 600 companies all over the world and handles projects that are different in scale and complexity.
 
Mediapark team develops professional e-commerce, finance, telecommunication, education and other solutions for both industry leaders and startups, and provides their clients with powerful, result-oriented websites, apps and systems that are modern and easy to use.
